title: Adopt Arcade 5.0
body:
Start with a manual update:

```
darc update-dependencies --source-repo arcade --channel ".NET Eng - Latest"
```

Validation:

- [x] Local builds
- [x] CI builds
- [x] Official (and `exp/`) builds
- [x] Double-check signing and optprof
- [ ] Insertion to VS
  - [ ] SignCheck
  - [x] RPS
- [ ] (after the fact) Darc flows
- [ ] Ensure policheck, credscan, and other automated checks are enabled
